definitions.definition: To describe or characterize something by listing its qualities .
To make someone, or to become competent or eligible for some position or task .
To certify or license someone for something.
To modify , limit , restrict or moderate something; especially to add conditions or requirements for an assertion to be true.
To mitigate , alleviate (something); to make less disagreeable .
To compete successfully in some stage of a competition and become eligible for the next stage.
To give individual quality to; to modulate; to vary; to regulate.
To throw and catch each object at least twice.
examples: to qualify seven balls you need at least fourteen catches

main_definition: To describe or characterize something by listing its qualities .
secondary_definitions: To make someone, or to become competent or eligible for some position or task .
To certify or license someone for something.
To modify , limit , restrict or moderate something; especially to add conditions or requirements for an assertion to be true.
( now rare ) To mitigate , alleviate (something); to make less disagreeable .
To compete successfully in some stage of a competition and become eligible for the next stage.
To give individual quality to; to modulate; to vary; to regulate.
( juggling ) To throw and catch each object at least twice.
